items.sentence: He\'s very young. He\'s much younger than Tom.
If Tom were here, we wouldn\'t have a problem.
If you do that, everyone\'s going to hate you.
If you don\'t want Tom here, ask him to leave.
Tom didn\'t want to call attention to himself.
Tom didn\'t want to cause us any more trouble.
Tom didn\'t want to sell any of his paintings.
Tom didn\'t want to share his lunch with Mary.
Tom asked me not to tell anyone, so I didn\'t.
I can\'t afford to buy anything in this store.
